Hi,
when I want to convert a CHEMKIN mechanism with matlab (version 7.0) 
as follows

ck2cti('mech.txt', 'therm.txt', 'tran.txt')

it should give out a mech.cti file,
but instead the error message appears.

>> ck2cti('mech.txt', 'therm.txt', 'tran.txt')
??? Undefined function or variable 'ctbin'.

Error in ==> ck2cti at 17
prog = [ctbin,'/ck2cti'];
 
Can anybody help me with that or can someone give me the correct 
syntax to convert this mechanism with ck2cti.exe in the command 
window?

Thanks for the help
Sven
